Description:
Roles & ResponsiblilitiesConduit installation (EMT, GRC and PVC).
Containment System Installation (Cable Trays, Trunk &; Ladders).
Cable Pulling (Copper, Optical Fiber & Co-Axial Cables).
Equipment Rack & Cabinet installation.
Splicing of Fiber Optic Cables (FOC).
Cable Dressing & Termination.
Cable Testing with Fluke Multi Meter, OTDR, Power Meter, etc.
Detailed design of Telecommunication rooms/ enclosures, in compliance with BICSI TDM manual code, as per Saudi Armco standards.
Pre-Commissioning of the deployed Systems as per Project Specs Requirements.
Familiarization with overall construction scope of work (Duct banks, Hand holes, Manholes & Embedded Accessories).
Monitor the underground installation; check the burial depth and spacing requirement to adjust spacing prior to backfilling.
Conduct internal inspection of all activities and record inspection findings in the internal inspection logbook; follow up with the construction to ensure that the
activities comply with the requirements.
Familiar with Engineering standards and procedures and applicable National and International codes and Standard as TIA/EIA, NEMA, BICSE etc.
Prepared schematics for Optical fiber & Copper cables as per industry standards.
Prepared Transmission link loss budget, pulling tension calculations, cable reelSkills
Skills:
Master's degree in a related field preferred
Working knowledge of products and services
In-depth understanding of industry standards and company policies
Good customer focus
Sharp attention to detail
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Great team player with the ability to work with minimal supervision
Knowledge, Capabilities & Skills
Saudi Driver License Holder
Excellent English/Arabic Spoken
